categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Galactic Empire launched an assault against the Cardooine Rebel base in 0 ABY. The strike force was stymied when the technician Tendaar Bel scrambled the Imperial IFF codes, allowing the Soaring Dactillions, flying prototype A-wings, to route the force. All but two of the Rebel pilots were killed in the assault, although the base was spared. The squadron proved that the A-wing featured superb qualities. Soon after, Bel and pilot Zal Artha were assigned to Alliance Special Operations.
The base was mentioned in Zal Artha and Tendaar Bel's Character Folios included with Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beginner Game.
